Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly

The assembly package contains objects for working with genomic data that has been assembled into Contigs and Scaffolds.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AssembledRead
    A AssembledRead is a read that has been assembled and placed at a particular location in its assembly.
    AssembledReadBuilder<R extends AssembledRead>
    Builds an AssembledRead for a specific contig.
    AssemblyTransformationService
    AssemblyTransformationService is an interface that will parse some kind of Assembly data into messages that an AssemblyTransformer can use.
    AssemblyTransformer
    AssemblyTransformer is an interface to transform one assembly format into another.
    Contig<T extends AssembledRead>
    A Contig is a CONTIGuous region of genomic data.
    ContigBuilder<R extends AssembledRead,C extends Contig<R>>
    ContigBuilder is a Builder for Contigs that allows creating a contig object by adding placed reads and setting a consensus.
    ContigDataStore<PR extends AssembledRead,C extends Contig<PR>>
    ContigDataStore is a marker interface for a DataStore implementation which stores Contigs of the same type.
    PlacedContig  
    Scaffold
    A scaffold (also known as a super-contig) is a layout of Contigs placed and oriented together such that it can be determined the distance and orientation between contigs.
    ScaffoldBuilder
    ScaffoldBuilder is a Builder that builds a single Scaffold.
    ScaffoldDataStore  
    ScaffoldDataStoreBuilder  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAssemblyTransformer
    AbstractAssemblyTransformer is an abstract class that implements all the methods of AssemblyTransformer but the methods are all no-ops.
    AbstractContigBuilder<P extends AssembledRead,C extends Contig<P>>
    AbstractContigBuilder implements the ContigBuilder interface
    AssemblyUtil
    AssemblyUtil is a utility class for working with AssembledReads and gapped NucleotideSequence.
    ContigDataStoreTransfomationService  
    ContigDataStoreTransfomationService.Builder  
    DefaultScaffold
    DefaultScaffold is a Scaffold implementation that stores all PlacedContigs data internally in various Maps and Sets.
    DefaultScaffoldDataStore  
    GappedReferenceBuilder
    GappedReferenceBuilder builds a GAPPED reference NucleotideSequence from an initial ungapped reference sequence and lots of insertions to various offsets made by aligned reads.
    ReadInfo
    ReadInfo is a value object that contains a read's trim information.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly Description

The assembly package contains objects for working with genomic data that has been assembled into Contigs and Scaffolds.
